Interface ExperienceHolderData

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<ExperienceHolderData>, DataManipulator<ExperienceHolderData>, DataSerializable

    public interface ExperienceHolderData
extends DataManipulator<ExperienceHolderData>

    • Method Detail

      • getExperienceSinceLevel

        int getExperienceSinceLevel()
        Gets the current experience accumulated since the last level-up.

        This is not the total experience this human has.

        Returns:
        The current experience accumulated since the last level-up.

      • setExperienceSinceLevel

        void setExperienceSinceLevel(int experience)
        Sets the experience accumulated since the last level-up.

        This is not the total experience this human has.

        Parameters:
        experience - The experience accumulated since the last level-up.

      • getExperienceBetweenLevels

        int getExperienceBetweenLevels()
        Gets the experience required since the last level to level up.

        For example, if level 14 reqiures 280 experience points, level 15 requires 315, and the player is at level 14, this method will return 35.

        Returns:
        the experience required since the last level to level up

      • getLevel

        int getLevel()
        Gets the current experience level of this human.
        Returns:
        The current level

      • setLevel

        void setLevel(int level)
        Sets the level of experience.
        Parameters:
        level - The level of experience

      • getTotalExperience

        int getTotalExperience()
        Gets the total accumulated experience this human has, including the experience to achieve the current experience level and the experienced gained towards the next level.
        Returns:
        The current total accumulated experience

      • setTotalExperience

        void setTotalExperience(int totalExperience)
        Sets the total accumulated experience starting from zero.
        Parameters:
        totalExperience - The total experience
